attributes.action: Allow homosexual men to donate blood
attributes.additional_details: Married homosexual men that are in long term relationships are also prevent due to the risk of infection. It seem crazy that any heterosexual promiscuous individual I are allowed to donate this life saving gift. This seems to be totally unfair.
attributes.background: With blood donations at an incredibly low level it is important to allow all individuals to donate blood. Although the donation of blood is a vital part of saving lives it seems ludicrous that homosexual men are still unable to donate blood.
